newsitem.title: CANADA: Two men die as Canadian fishing boat sinks.
newsitem.headline: Two men die as Canadian fishing boat sinks.

text.p: Two men died and another survived Friday after a small fishing boat sank off Canada's east coast.
The 28-foot (8.5-metre) boat went down in 20-knot winds and waves of up to 10 feet (three metres) off Cape Breton, said Mike Forsythe, of the Rescue Co-ordination Centre.
The survivor and two bodies were recovered by nearby fishing boats. Officials said they did not immediately know the cause of the incident.
The boat was registered in Sydney, Nova Scotia, but was based in nearby Glace Bay.
